function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling of biological samples and reagents in the laboratory increases the risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among laboratory personnel and the general population.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment, regular disinfection of laboratory surfaces.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, UV sterilization systems.","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, general population.","Owner":"Laboratory managers, biosafety officers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate handling of high-throughput sequencing equipment and reagents can pose a risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential introduction of contaminants into the sequencing process, leading to inaccurate results and potential exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of equipment, use of sterile techniques, proper training of personnel.","Technologies":"HEPA-filtered clean benches, UV germicidal irradiation systems, DNA/RNA decontamination solutions.","People":"Laboratory technicians, sequencing facility staff, researchers.","Owner":"Laboratory managers, sequencing facility managers, quality control personnel."},{"Description":"Risk of cross-contamination and infection spread during primer sequence removal, read trimming, and data analysis processes.","Impact":"Introduction of errors in data analysis, potential misinterpretation of results, and risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Validation of bioinformatics pipelines, use of quality control measures, strict adherence to bioinformatics best practices.","Technologies":"Bioinformatics software with quality control functions, data validation tools, contamination detection algorithms.","People":"Bioinformaticians, data analysts, researchers.","Owner":"Bioinformatics team leads, laboratory managers, quality assurance personnel."}]}
